sentences.en: A recurrence of such an oversight could impair our amicable relations.
sentences.cn: 这样的疏忽倘若再发生,可能有损双方的友好贸易关系.

sentences.en: A recurrence of this kind of illness is possible.
As someoneundergoing treatment for cancer, I wanted to do whatever I could to stop it inits tracks and prevent a recurrence.
sentences.cn: 作为一个正在接受癌症治疗的人，我想要做我所能做的一切来阻止它的进程和防止复发。

sentences.en: attempts to prevent a recurrence of the problem
sentences.cn: 防止问题再次发生的努力

sentences.en: By the late nineteenth century the recurrence of this pattern had become obvious to many observers.
sentences.cn: 到十九世纪末期,许多观察家都看出了这种反复现象.

sentences.en: Generating functions are an ideal tool for studying sequences defined by recurrence.
sentences.cn: 母函数是研究用递推关系来确定的函数的最理想工具.

sentences.en: He was aware of the possibility of a recurrence of his illness.
sentences.cn: 他知道他的病有可能复发.

sentences.en: His mind was buoyed by a recurrence of the mood he had felt after Hennessey's death.
sentences.cn: 此刻他心头不禁又涌起了他在汉奈西死后感到的那种激动,精神也为之一振.

sentences.en: If you have a recurrence, talk to your doctor about getting a new biopsy before settling on treatment.
sentences.cn: 如果你存在复发，那么跟你的医生谈论在制定治疗方案前再做一次新的活检。

sentences.en: If, after treatment and after those five years, there is no recurrence of the cancer, then the patient is declared cured.
sentences.cn: 癌症的一个康复标准是：如果在经过治疗后五年病情没有复发，那么这个患者我们可以说他是得到了康复。

sentences.en: More care in the future will prevent recurrence of the mistake.
sentences.cn: 将来的小心可防止错误的重现.

sentences.en: Never again did he intend her to have a recurrence of fear of the dark.
sentences.cn: 从此他再见也不想让她在黑暗中受惊那样的事重新发生了.

sentences.en: No recurrence was detected over a 1 - year follow - up period.
sentences.cn: 病人在施行肿瘤全切除后一年未有复发之迹象.

sentences.en: Police are out in force to prevent a recurrence of the violence.
sentences.cn: 警方出动大量警力防止暴力事件再次发生。

sentences.en: Several procedures are available to meet practical problems of frequent recurrence.
sentences.cn: 在经常遇到的实际问题中,有几种测定方法是适用的.

sentences.en: So it went on contiunally, the recurrence of love and conflict between them.
sentences.cn: 两人的爱和冲突就这样持续交替着.

sentences.en: There was no evidence of recurrence after a 4 months follow up.
sentences.cn: 此病灶被切除并留有0.6公分之安全边缘.

sentences.en: They are growing slowly with a propensity for local recurrence and metastasis.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤本身特性为缓慢变大,具有局部再发和转移现象.
